title: Drawing, Design for Four-Door Sideboard in Elevation and Plan, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Four-Door Sideboard in Elevation and Plan
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, center left: OIO [underlined]; below diagonally: Oak 165; at center below elevation, numerical notations
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description:
Elevation view: oblong sideboard with tri-partite front on low conforming platform; at center front, 2 doors below 2 drawers, flanked by 2 fluted pilasters and a door topped with single drawer and with molded decorative panel at center; low back splash.
Plan view: shows oblong sideboard with rounded corners; indistinct sketch above probably meant to indicate dimensions of central front section.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Four-Door Sideboard in Elevation and Plan, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-42
